unnormalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill this month is showing 2500 rupees! Last month it was only Rs. 1800. I think the AC is to blame, running it almost 24/7 during this heat wave. Bijli consumption is up by 30% according to the meter reading. Gotta check if there's any leak or something, otherwise my pocket will be empty by next bill cycle!
normalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill this month is showing two thousand five hundred rupees! Last month it was only rupee one thousand eight hundred. I think the A-C is to blame, running it almost twenty four slash seven during this heat wave. Bijli consumption is up by thirty percent according to the meter reading. Gotta check if there's any leak or something, otherwise my pocket will be empty by next bill cycle!
